name: @holochain/wind-tunnel-summary-visualiser
description: A tool to generate a pretty HTML report from Wind Tunnel scenario run summary JSON.
author: Holochain Team

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && npx rollup src/assets/windTunnel.js --file dist/windTunnel.js --format es && cp src/assets/windTunnel.css dist/
